p: In contrast to env, SIVsm gag p27 was under strong purifying selection in infected SMs. Temporal analyses of gag p27 demonstrated no evidence of the fixation of specific aa substitutions, suggesting that gag p27 is not the target of strong selective pressures such as those that might be expected if anti-Gag cellular immune responses were present. These observations corroborate our findings that natural SM hosts mount limited cellular immune responses to SIV infection [ 22, 23, 72].
